grumbo.name: Grumbo
grumbo.description: Well if it isn't Grumbo! The most ordinary of Grumbos!
grumbo.loss: $name lost! Maybe you should try harder my dude.

toxic_grumbo.name: Toxic Grumbo
toxic_grumbo.description: This Grumbo learned from the best Draven player of all time. Inflicts poison upon losing. The brightest of intellectuals.
toxic_grumbo.loss: $name lost all self-esteem after being constantly flamed by Toxic Grumbo.

grumbo_thief.name: Grumbo Thief
grumbo_thief.description: A thief who takes some gold if you lose. You also gain a little bit more gold for winning. Average stats.
grumbo_thief.victory: $name avoided getting their lunch money taken!
grumbo_thief.loss: $name had his pockets cut by Grumbo Thief!

grumbassassin.name: Grumbassassin
grumbassassin.description: The Grumbassassin is out to get you... and all of your remaining battle stocks and HP. Lower on Power.
grumbassassin.loss: $name has been assassinated by the Grumbassassin!

wumbo.name: Wumbo
wumbo.description: Wumbo this. Wumbo that. But you can't Wumbo your way past a 70% chance of victory against this Wumbo fellow. High in Power. Surprisingly average in Wumbology.

spidergrumbo.name: SpiderGrumbo
spidergrumbo.description: Creepy crawly SpiderGrumbo is on his way. Inflicts Fear and Poison upon losing. Miniscule lower stats, if you get what I mean.
spidergrumbo.loss: SpiderGrumbo had a good bite out of $name!

grandbo.name: Grandbo
grandbo.description: The grandest of Grumbos. So grand, he gives you a grand gift upon beating him! Weaker than a regular Grumbo.
grandbo.loss: $name somehow lost to the Grandbo! No gift for you.

grumbro.name: Grumbro
grumbro.description: A Grumbo bro. Helps you out whether you win or lose.
grumbro.loss: $name was beaten by Grumbro, but it wasn't so bad.

grumbo_cat.name: Grumbo Cat
grumbo_cat.description: Grumbo Cat. Big Meaty Claws. Can make you bleed. Slightly lower stats on average.
grumbo_cat.victory: $name sent Grumbo Cat to Grumbo Cat Heaven!
grumbo_cat.loss: $name was scratched in the face by Grumbo Cat!

grumbo_gazer.name: Grumbo Gazer
grumbo_gazer.description: Medusa's brother, Grumbo Gazer. Don't gaze into his Grumbeyes or you'll be petrified! Average stats.
grumbo_gazer.loss: $name gazed into the Grumbo Gazer's eyes!

mighty_grumbo.name: Mighty Grumbo
mighty_grumbo.description: The Mighty Grumbo! The mightier the level, the mightier the stats!
mighty_grumbo.loss: $name was overwhelmed by their mighty opponent!

grumbo_tree.name: Grumbo Tree
grumbo_tree.description: Bask in the knowledge and wisdom of the Grumbo Tree! Take caution not to get tripped up by its roots.
grumbo_tree.loss: $name got knocked over by a stray apple from the Grumbo Tree!

accursed_grumbo.name: Accursed Grumbo
accursed_grumbo.description: This Grumbo is under a curse! Perhaps you will be to...
accursed_grumbo.loss: The Accursed Grumbo has cursed $name to the grave!

sandy_grumbo.name: Sandy Grumbo
sandy_grumbo.description: Careful not to get sand in your eyes while battling against this grainy Grumbo!
sandy_grumbo.victory: $name shows that they definitely hate sand!
